modName: A Sexy Lydia Replacer CBBE B_02
summary:
Replace Lydia with a much better looking one !!
Replace the standard armor with the DB armor player 01 version.
Replace the long bow with a Deadric bow and arrow.
descriptionHtml:
[color=\"#00FF00\"]Description:
===========
Replace Lydia with a much better looking one !!
Replace the standard armor with the DB armor player 01 version.
Replace the long bow with a Deadric bow and arrow.[/color]

[color=\"#008080\"]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9qXyD_DJH6g
==========================================[/color]
Original Mod :
=============
[color=\"#00FF00\"]A Sexy Lydia Replacer CBBE V_05 by Laurkami ~~~~~ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11187
[/color]

Version 0.2 : Add to inventory :

Healing spell
Nightingale blade
Gold 4500
Default outfit DB
Scale 0.99
Health 300
Essential ON
Deadric arrow 400

Change the default outfit to DB  .
 ...so you can dress her as you wish.... 

Installation :
===========

The Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) is recommended for properly installing the mod. If you use NMM, just download and install!

Uninstalling :
============

Delete all the files you installed/use NMM to uninstall them. Or manually delete A Sexy Lydia Replacer CBBE B_02.esp from your Skyrim\\Data folder.

Conflicts :
=========

May conflict with any other mods that change Lydia !!!!
